discourse_list.title: SourceCred distribution for week ending May 9th, 2021, tithe change

content.content: The weekly SourceCred payouts are here! A hosted instance of SourceCred running on the Maker forum can be found here. For details on opting in, see Opting in to Sourcecred/Wth is SourceCred?. Announcements In this distribution, the tithe of %5 Cred to SourceCred has been temporarily disabled due to volatility in SourceCred’s percentage of the DAI payout. tldr; in the first week the tithe was on, SourceCred received 527 DAI, which was in line with expectations, as SourceCred was owed ~4 weeks of “catchup” payments (it should settle after a couple weeks to around 5% of DAI payouts, or 250 DAI/week). However, due to unique properties of Maker’s instance and the recent spike in forum activity, we are not seeing SourceCred’s percentage decrease as fast as expected. Therefore, while we debug the tithe feature to make SourceCred’s DAI payouts more predictable, we have disabled the tithe. For the last two payouts (the weeks ending 5/2 and 5/9), SourceCred has not received payouts from the tithe. We will instead receive 5% of the DAI payouts (250 DAI) directly from Maker (GovAlpha CU) until we can resolve the issue. Note that this equates to a 5% increase in payouts to contributors, reversing the effective 5% decrease when SourceCred turned on the tithe.  (standard)  WARNING:  Cred scores and payouts may see volatility in the coming weeks and months as we tweak the algorithm and payout parameters. We still have a lot of work to do before the system is optimized enough to “ossify”, producing predictable payouts. Payouts This week $5,000 worth of DAI was distributed to 97 contributors. Navigate to the DAI Accounts tab  of the Maker instance to see your current DAI balance and total DAI earned. Cred Stats Below is a chart showing total Cred created (a proxy for work). After ranging in the ~3,500 Cred/week range for the last couple months, Cred has high an ATH of ~4,700  .  image1384×1064 77.1 KB  Top Contributions Below are the top 10 posts created last week, ranked by Cred generated.     Cred Contribution Author     358.7 Maker Foundation Returns 84,000 MKR to Governance @Elihu   250.4 Growth CU weekly update: April 29- May 6 @Nadia   217.3 Financial Report - 2021-04 @SebVentures   208.5 [Discussion] MakerDAO Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) & Capital Allocation @Aes   198.2 Transfer redeemer contract ownership from the Foundation to Governance @wouter   184.7 New Silver April 2021 Update @prankstr25   175 REPLY to: [Informal Poll] Should we have a cooldown period before deciding how to spend the Foundation’s MKR tokens? @Spidomo   153.5 REPLY to: Maker Foundation Returns 84,000 MKR to Governance @AstronautThis   142.8 MIP52: Dispute Resolution @g_dip   134.1 [PA-DROP] MIP6 Application: US-BASED SUPPLY CHAIN FINANCE FOR LARGE OEMS @roollie    Top Contributors Below are the top 10 contributors last week, ranked by Cred generated.     Cred Contributor     247.3 PaperImperium   201.2 SebVentures   187.2 LongForWisdom   184.9 prose11   161.7 ElProgreso   154.1 g-dip   141.8 ultraschuppi   139.4 mrabino1   117 Aaron-Bartsch   102.6 AstronautThis    If you have any questions or concerns about the scores, data or presentation thereof, please don’t hesitate to ask!
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
